Detailed Description

Model class for software products.

Software objects represent software products that are released to the public on the Emeraldion Lodge. Since software development is our main business, this model class is particularly loaded with functionality.

Definition at line 13 of file software.php.

Member Function Documentation

Software::relative_url (  ) 

Provides a relative URL that will be used by the permalink public method.

Subclassers that wish to provide custom permalinks for objects should override this method. You should return the URL portion after the APPLICATION_ROOT part only.

Reimplemented from ActiveRecord.
